text: Radochów () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Lądek-Zdrój, within Kłodzko County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. Prior to 1945 it was in Germany. It lies approximately west of Lądek-Zdrój, south-east of Kłodzko, and south of the regional capital Wrocław. The village has an approximate population of 500. ==References== Category:Villages in Kłodzko County
title: Radochów
